Uses of Class
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Point

Packages that use Point
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model Models how to present the stitches with a pair diagram, thread diagram or descriptive instructions. 
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.xml Implements XML manipulations such as conversion to the diagram object model and apply modifications in the diagram on the original DOM tree.
